enter-optionally:

you can measure waist with our built-in meter
what-is-bmi:
*BMI- Body Mass Index ...... BMR-Basal Metabolism, the energy your body needs at rest.
* On average, 7,700 kcal is needed to burn 1kg of fat
my-recommendations-description: If your recommendations are different from the recommendations given by the application, enter your values here, otherwise leave blank.
food-you-do-not-eat-description: Please select foods that you do not eat to exclude them from your diet plan
training-plan-description: THESE ARE THE TRAININGS THAT ARE WAITING FOR YOU IN YOUR PROFILE. CLICK NEXT TO COMPLETE PROCESS
training-plan-warning:
The use of weights and large additional burdens on adolescence at puberty (<16 years) has a very negative effect on proper growth and development, causing some negative effects that may cause later disabilities in sports and daily life.

Recommendation: self-weight strength exercises (squats, joints, pushups, tummy tucks), stretching exercises and perfect adoption of all the exercises that will later be the basis for upgrading with external loads.
meal-plan-warning:
Persons under 18 should not use a menu smaller than 1500 kcal for girls and 1700 kcal for boys because of the energy needed for growth and development. Persons under the age of 18 should consult a doctor and use the menu with the supervision of their parents.

This menu does not guarantee instant success, but if you follow all the instructions given correctly, the results should not be missing. You run the menu at your own risk!
enter-email: Enter the E-mail address that you want to receive on the 30-day personalized diet plan and training plan
gdpr-accept: I have read and agree to the above terms
personalised-meal-plan: Your personalized 30-day diet plan and workout plan will arrive in the mail shortly.
